Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Relates to providing a residential asbestos remediation tax credit
Summary: Provides for a residential asbestos remediation tax credit for the costs of abatement of asbestos contamination in certain residential real property, when such removal is recommended by an asbestos professional.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a residential asbestos remediation tax credit
